trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Waltham
There were no other sightings in Waltham on or around January 23rd 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsOut on porch having a cigarette, looking up at the clouds, BIG Bright green light falling fast like a shooting star only slower I was teetering on the top step.Saw it, blinked in disbelief and grabbed pillar holding up porch roof bracing for impact, It was at least as big as the biggest airplane I've ever seen I thought it was going to crash East South East of Waltham Ma. duration 2-3 seconds. Clouds were patchy, started behind clouds I saw it when passed into cloudless sky, then disapeared behind clouds again
Summary: Big green light more white yellow in the center.
